24: וְחָרָ֣ה <sup>2734 </sup> <n>shall wax hot</n> אַפִּ֔י <sup>639 </sup> <n>And my wrath</n> וְהָרַגְתִּ֥י <sup>2026 </sup> <n>and I will kill</n> אֶתְכֶ֖ם <sup>853 </sup> בֶּחָ֑רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>you with the sword</n> וְהָי֤וּ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall become</n> נְשֵׁיכֶם֙ <sup>802 </sup> <n>and your wives</n> אַלְמָנ֔וֹת <sup>490 </sup> <n>shall be widows</n> וּבְנֵיכֶ֖ם <sup>1121 </sup> <n>and your children</n> יְתֹמִֽים׃ <sup>3490 </sup> <n>fatherless</n> פ
25: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> כֶּ֣סֶף ׀ <sup>3701 </sup> <n>money</n> תַּלְוֶ֣ה <sup>3867 </sup> <n>If thou lend</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> עַמִּ֗י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>to [any of] my people</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הֶֽעָנִי֙ <sup>6041 </sup> <n>[that is] poor</n> עִמָּ֔ךְ <sup>5973 </sup> <n>among</n> לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>are not</n> תִהְיֶ֥ה <sup>1961 </sup> <n>to act</n> ל֖וֹ כְּנֹשֶׁ֑ה <sup>5383 </sup> <n>by thee thou shalt not be to him as an usurer</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תְשִׂימ֥וּן <sup>7760 </sup> <n>neither shalt thou lay</n> עָלָ֖יו <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נֶֽשֶׁךְ׃ <sup>5392 </sup> <n>upon him usury</n>
26: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>If</n> חָבֹ֥ל <sup>2254 </sup> <n>If thou at all</n> תַּחְבֹּ֖ל <sup>2254 </sup> <n>to pledge</n> שַׂלְמַ֣ת <sup>8008 </sup> <n>raiment</n> רֵעֶ֑ךָ <sup>7453 </sup> <n>thy neighbour's</n> עַד־ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>it unto him by</n> בֹּ֥א <sup>935 </sup> <n>goeth down</n> הַשֶּׁ֖מֶשׁ <sup>8121 </sup> <n>that the sun</n> תְּשִׁיבֶ֥נּוּ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>thou shalt deliver</n> לֽוֹ׃
27: כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> הִ֤וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>he</n> [כְסוּתָה כ] (כְסוּתֹו֙ <sup>3682 </sup> <n>covering</n> ק) לְבַדָּ֔הּ <sup>905 </sup> <n>is his only</n> הִ֥וא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>it</n> שִׂמְלָת֖וֹ <sup>8071 </sup> <n>only it [is] his raiment</n> לְעֹר֑וֹ <sup>5785 </sup> <n>for his skin</n> בַּמֶּ֣ה <sup>4100 </sup> <n>What</n> יִשְׁכָּ֔ב <sup>7901 </sup> <n>wherein shall he sleep</n> וְהָיָה֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>shall come</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> יִצְעַ֣ק <sup>6817 </sup> <n>? and it shall come to pass when he crieth</n> אֵלַ֔י <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> וְשָׁמַעְתִּ֖י <sup>8085 </sup> <n>unto me that I will hear</n> כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>when</n> חַנּ֥וּן <sup>2587 </sup> <n>for I [am] gracious</n> אָֽנִי׃ <sup>589 </sup> <n>I</n> ס
28: אֱלֹהִ֖ים <sup>430 </sup> <n>the gods</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תְקַלֵּ֑ל <sup>7043 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not revile</n> וְנָשִׂ֥יא <sup>5387 </sup> <n>the ruler</n> בְעַמְּךָ֖ <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of thy people</n> לֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>nor</n> תָאֹֽר׃ <sup>779 </sup> <n>nor curse</n>
29: מְלֵאָתְךָ֥ <sup>4395 </sup> <n>[to offer] the first of thy ripe fruits</n> וְדִמְעֲךָ֖ <sup>1831 </sup> <n>and of thy liquors</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>shall not</n> תְאַחֵ֑ר <sup>309 </sup> <n>Thou shalt not delay</n> בְּכ֥וֹר <sup>1060 </sup> <n>the firstborn</n> בָּנֶ֖יךָ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>of thy sons</n> תִּתֶּן־ <sup>5414 </sup> <n>shalt thou give</n> לִּֽי׃
